USE NYC_TAXI_DISCOVERY;

SELECT
    min(total_amount) as min_total_amount,
    max(total_amount) as min_total_amount,
    avg(total_amount) as min_total_amount,
    count(*) as total_nubeer_of_records,
    count(*) as not_null_total_nubeer_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data
    where total_amount < 0;
    
----

SELECT payment_type,description
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',        
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS PAYMENT_TYPE
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    );

-------

SELECT
    payment_type,
    count(*) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data
    where total_amount < 0
    group by payment_type
    order by payment_type;


SELECT
    TOP 10000000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data
    ---where total_amount < 0
